meanings.definition: Weak or feeble in strength or character.
meanings.sent1: The debile old man struggled to lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: She felt debile after a long day of work.
meanings.sent3: The debile kitten tried to catch the fast-moving toy.
meanings.sent4: His debile resolve crumbled under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The debile bridge could not withstand the weight of the truck.

meanings.definition: Lacking in intelligence or mental capacity.
meanings.sent1: The debile student had trouble understanding the math problem.
meanings.sent2: Her debile memory made it hard for her to remember names.
meanings.sent3: The debile robot kept bumping into walls.
meanings.sent4: His debile reasoning led to poor decision-making.
meanings.sent5: The debile computer struggled to process complex data.
